trans-unit.source: Use Office UI Fabric in Office Add-ins
trans-unit.target: 在 Office 增益集中使用 Office UI Fabric

alt-trans.target: 在 Office 增益集中使用 Office UI Fabric

trans-unit.source: If you are building an Office Add-in, we encourage you to use [Office UI Fabric](https://dev.office.com/fabric) to create your user experience.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建置 Office 增益集，我們鼓勵您使用 [Office UI Fabric](https://dev.office.com/fabric)來建立使用者經驗。

alt-trans.source: If you are building an Office Add-in, we encourage you to use [Office UI Fabric](https://dev.office.com/fabric) to create your user experience. The following steps walk you through the basics for using Fabric.
alt-trans.target: 如果您要建置 Office 增益集，我們鼓勵您使用 [Office UI Fabric](https://dev.office.com/fabric)來建立使用者經驗。下列步驟會引導您了解使用 Fabric 的基本知識。

trans-unit.source: Office UI Fabric is a JavaScript front-end framework for building user experiences for Office and Office 365. Fabric provides visuals-focused components that you can extend, rework, and use in your Office Add-in. Because Fabric uses the Office Design Language, Fabric's UX components look like a natural extension of Office.
trans-unit.target: Office UI Fabric 是用於建置 Office 與 Office 365 之使用者體驗的 JavaScript 前端架構。Fabric 提供以視覺效果為主的元件，您可用於擴充、重新作業，以及用於您的 Office 增益集。由於 Fabric 使用了 Office 設計語言，所以 Fabric 的 UX 元件看起來與 Office 一般擴充項目無異。

trans-unit.source: Office UI Fabric is a JavaScript front-end framework for building user experiences for Office and Office 365.
trans-unit.target: Office UI Fabric is a JavaScript front-end framework for building user experiences for Office and Office 365.

trans-unit.source: Fabric provides visuals-focused components that you can extend, rework, and use in your Office Add-in.
trans-unit.target: Fabric provides visuals-focused components that you can extend, rework, and use in your Office Add-in.

trans-unit.source: Because Fabric uses the Office Design Language, Fabric's UX components look like a natural extension of Office.
trans-unit.target: Because Fabric uses the Office Design Language, Fabric's UX components look like a natural extension of Office.

trans-unit.source: Fabric consists of several projects:
trans-unit.target: Fabric 由數個專案所組成︰

trans-unit.source: **Fabric JS (recommended)** - Implements UX components using JavaScript only. We recommend using this version of Fabric if you don't want to take a dependency on the React framework.
trans-unit.target: **Fabric JS (建議選項)** - 僅使用 JavaScript 來實作 UX 元件。若您不希望從 React 架構中取得相依性，我們建議您使用此版本的 Fabric。

trans-unit.source: **Fabric JS (recommended)** - Implements UX components using JavaScript only.
trans-unit.target: **Fabric JS (recommended)** - Implements UX components using JavaScript only.

trans-unit.source: We recommend using this version of Fabric if you don't want to take a dependency on the React framework.
trans-unit.target: We recommend using this version of Fabric if you don't want to take a dependency on the React framework.

trans-unit.source: **Fabric React** - Implements the UX components using the React framework.
trans-unit.target: **Fabric React** - 使用 React 架構來實作 UX 元件。

trans-unit.source: **Fabric Core** - Contains the core elements of the design language such as icons, colors, type, and grid. Both Fabric JS and Fabric React use Fabric Core.
trans-unit.target: **Fabric Core** - 包含設計語言 (例如：圖示、色彩、類型及格線)的核心元素。Fabric JS 及 Fabric React 皆使用 Fabric Core。

trans-unit.source: **Fabric Core** - Contains the core elements of the design language such as icons, colors, type, and grid.
trans-unit.target: **Fabric Core** - Contains the core elements of the design language such as icons, colors, type, and grid.

trans-unit.source: Both Fabric JS and Fabric React use Fabric Core.
trans-unit.target: Both Fabric JS and Fabric React use Fabric Core.

trans-unit.source: The following steps walk you through the basics of using Fabric JS.
trans-unit.target: 下列步驟會引導您了解使用 Fabric JS 的基本知識。

trans-unit.source: 1. Add the Fabric CDN references
trans-unit.target: 1.新增 Fabric CDN 參考

trans-unit.source: To reference Fabric from the CDN, add the following HTML code to your page.
trans-unit.target: 若要從 CDN 參考 Fabric，新增下列 HTML 程式碼到您的頁面。

trans-unit.source: That's it. Now you're ready to start using Fabric in your add-in.
trans-unit.target: 僅以上步驟。現在您已準備好可在增益集中使用 Fabric。

trans-unit.source: That's it.
trans-unit.target: That's it.

trans-unit.source: Now you're ready to start using Fabric in your add-in.
trans-unit.target: Now you're ready to start using Fabric in your add-in.

trans-unit.source: 2. Use Fabric icons and fonts
trans-unit.target: 2.使用 Fabric 圖示和字型

trans-unit.source: Using icons is simple. All you have to do is use an "i" element and reference the appropriate classes. You can control the size of the icon by changing the font size. For example, the following code shows how to make an extra-large table icon that uses the themePrimary (#0078d7) color.
trans-unit.target: 使用圖示很簡單。只需使用 "i" 項目並參考適當的類別即可。只要變更字型大小，即可控制圖示的大小。例如，下列程式碼示範如何建立使用 themePrimary (#0078d7) 色彩的特大表格圖示。

trans-unit.source: Using icons is simple.
trans-unit.target: Using icons is simple.

trans-unit.source: All you have to do is use an "i" element and reference the appropriate classes.
trans-unit.target: All you have to do is use an "i" element and reference the appropriate classes.

trans-unit.source: You can control the size of the icon by changing the font size.
trans-unit.target: You can control the size of the icon by changing the font size.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code shows how to make an extra-large table icon that uses the themePrimary (#0078d7) color.
trans-unit.target: For example, the following code shows how to make an extra-large table icon that uses the themePrimary (#0078d7) color.

trans-unit.source: To find more icons that are available in Office UI Fabric, use the search feature on the [Icons](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/icons) page. When you find an icon to use in your add-in, be sure to prefix the icon name with `ms-Icon--`.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找 Office UI Fabric 中更多可用的圖示，請使用[圖示](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/icons)頁面上的 [搜尋] 功能。當您找到要用於增益集內的圖示時，請務必在圖示名稱前面加上 `ms-Icon--`。

trans-unit.source: To find more icons that are available in Office UI Fabric, use the search feature on the [Icons](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/icons) page.
trans-unit.target: To find more icons that are available in Office UI Fabric, use the search feature on the [Icons](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/icons) page.

trans-unit.source: When you find an icon to use in your add-in, be sure to prefix the icon name with `ms-Icon--`.
trans-unit.target: When you find an icon to use in your add-in, be sure to prefix the icon name with `ms-Icon--`.

trans-unit.source: For information about font sizes and colors that are available in Office UI Fabric, see [Typography](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/typography) and [Colors](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/colors).
trans-unit.target: 如需 Office UI Fabric 內可用字型大小及色彩的相關資訊，請參閱[印刷樣式](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/typography)和[色彩](https://dev.office.com/fabric#/styles/colors)。

trans-unit.source: 3. Use Fabric JS UX components
trans-unit.target: 3.使用 Fabric JS UX 元件

trans-unit.source: Fabric provides several UX components, like buttons or checkboxes, that you can use in your add-in. The following is a list of the Fabric JS UX components that we recommend for use in an add-in. To use one of the Fabric components in your add-in, follow the link to the Fabric documentation, and then follow the instructions in **Using this component**.
trans-unit.target: Fabric 提供了多種您可用於增益集中的 UX 元件，例如：按鈕或核取方塊。以下是建議用於增益集中的 Fabric JS UX 元件清單。若要在增益集中使用任一 Fabric 元件，請前往連結以取得 Fabric 文件，接著依照**使用此元件**的指示進行。

trans-unit.source: Fabric provides several UX components, like buttons or checkboxes, that you can use in your add-in.
trans-unit.target: Fabric provides several UX components, like buttons or checkboxes, that you can use in your add-in.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the Fabric JS UX components that we recommend for use in an add-in.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of the Fabric JS UX components that we recommend for use in an add-in.

trans-unit.source: To use one of the Fabric components in your add-in, follow the link to the Fabric documentation, and then follow the instructions in **Using this component**.
trans-unit.target: To use one of the Fabric components in your add-in, follow the link to the Fabric documentation, and then follow the instructions in **Using this component**.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** We will add additional components over time.
trans-unit.target: **附註：**我們將陸續新增其他元件。

trans-unit.source: Updating your add-in to use Fabric JS
trans-unit.target: 更新您的增益集以使用 Fabric JS

trans-unit.source: If you've been using a previous version of Office UI Fabric and you'd like to move to Fabric JS, make sure that you learn about, incorporate, and test the new components in your add-in. Keep the following points in mind to help you plan for your updates:
trans-unit.target: 若您已在使用舊版 Office UI Fabric 且想改為使用 Fabric JS，請確保會深入了解、整合及測試增益集內的新元件。請記住以下幾點，對於規劃更新時會有所助益：

trans-unit.source: If you've been using a previous version of Office UI Fabric and you'd like to move to Fabric JS, make sure that you learn about, incorporate, and test the new components in your add-in.
trans-unit.target: If you've been using a previous version of Office UI Fabric and you'd like to move to Fabric JS, make sure that you learn about, incorporate, and test the new components in your add-in.

trans-unit.source: Keep the following points in mind to help you plan for your updates:
trans-unit.target: Keep the following points in mind to help you plan for your updates:

trans-unit.source: Component initialization is simpler using Fabric JS. For previous versions of Fabric, you include the Fabric component's JavaScript file in your add-in project, included a `<Script>` reference to that file, and then initialize the component. In Fabric JS, you no longer need to include the Fabric component's JavaScript file and the associated `<Script>` reference. All you need to do is initialize the Fabric component.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Fabric JS 進行元件初始化會更為簡單。針對舊版的 Fabric，您可以將 Fabric 元件的 JavaScript 檔案加入增益集專案 (其中已包含該檔案的 `<Script>` 參考) 中，接著再初始化元件。在Fabric JS 中，已不再需要加入 Fabric 元件的 JavaScript 檔案和相關的 `<Script>` 參考。您只需要初始化 Fabric 元件。

trans-unit.source: Component initialization is simpler using Fabric JS.
trans-unit.target: Component initialization is simpler using Fabric JS.

trans-unit.source: For previous versions of Fabric, you include the Fabric component's JavaScript file in your add-in project, included a `<Script>` reference to that file, and then initialize the component.
trans-unit.target: For previous versions of Fabric, you include the Fabric component's JavaScript file in your add-in project, included a `<Script>` reference to that file, and then initialize the component.

trans-unit.source: In Fabric JS, you no longer need to include the Fabric component's JavaScript file and the associated `<Script>` reference.
trans-unit.target: In Fabric JS, you no longer need to include the Fabric component's JavaScript file and the associated `<Script>` reference.

trans-unit.source: All you need to do is initialize the Fabric component.
trans-unit.target: All you need to do is initialize the Fabric component.

trans-unit.source: Several components now provide functions that control the behavior of the UX component. For example, the checkbox control has a `toggle` function that switches between the checked and unchecked states.
trans-unit.target: 目前有多種元件已提供可控制 UX 元件行為的函式。例如，核取方塊控制具有 `toggle` 函式，其可在核取及未核取狀態之間切換。

trans-unit.source: Several components now provide functions that control the behavior of the UX component.
trans-unit.target: Several components now provide functions that control the behavior of the UX component.

trans-unit.source: For example, the checkbox control has a `toggle` function that switches between the checked and unchecked states.
trans-unit.target: For example, the checkbox control has a `toggle` function that switches between the checked and unchecked states.

trans-unit.source: Some icon class names and styles have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 而部分圖示類別名稱及樣式已經更新。

trans-unit.source: The most notable change is the use of the `<label>` element in many components. The `<label>` element controls the style of the component. You might have to update your UX code to use the `<label>` element. For example, changing the value of the `<input>` element's checked attribute on a Fabric JS checkbox has no effect on the checkbox. Instead, you use the `check`, `unCheck`, or `toggle` functions.
trans-unit.target: 最值得注意的變更，便是在多項元件中使用 `<label>` 元素。`<label>` 元素可控制元件的樣式。您可能需要更新您的 UX 程式碼，以便使用 `<label>` 元素。例如，在 Fabric JS 核取方塊上變更 `<input>` 元素已核取屬性的值，不會在核取方塊上產生作用。反之，您可使用 `check`、`unCheck` 或 `toggle` 函式。

trans-unit.source: The most notable change is the use of the `<label>` element in many components.
trans-unit.target: The most notable change is the use of the `<label>` element in many components.

trans-unit.source: The `<label>` element controls the style of the component.
trans-unit.target: The `<label>` element controls the style of the component.

trans-unit.source: You might have to update your UX code to use the `<label>` element.
trans-unit.target: You might have to update your UX code to use the `<label>` element.

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the value of the `<input>` element's checked attribute on a Fabric JS checkbox has no effect on the checkbox.
trans-unit.target: For example, changing the value of the `<input>` element's checked attribute on a Fabric JS checkbox has no effect on the checkbox.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you use the `check`, `unCheck`, or `toggle` functions.
trans-unit.target: Instead, you use the `check`, `unCheck`, or `toggle` functions.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: 後續步驟

trans-unit.source: If you're looking for an end-to-end code sample that shows you how to use Fabric JS, we've got you covered. See the following resource:
trans-unit.target: 如果您想尋找示範如何使用 Fabric JS 的端對端程式碼範例，我們也提供了相關資訊。請參閱以下資源：

trans-unit.source: If you're looking for an end-to-end code sample that shows you how to use Fabric JS, we've got you covered.
trans-unit.target: If you're looking for an end-to-end code sample that shows you how to use Fabric JS, we've got you covered.

trans-unit.source: See the following resource:
trans-unit.target: See the following resource:

trans-unit.target: 相關資源
